headline: 2002 - Meningococcal disease in the Great Lakes area (Burundi, Rwanda)
main_text: Burundi: The Ministry of Health of Burundi has reported 269 cases and 30 deaths (case-fatality rate of 11%) in Ngozi ,Muyinga, Kirundo provinces from 6 July 2002.  Neisseria meningitidis serogroup A has been confirmed in 15 out of 29 samples *this updates the previous information of 6 out of 8 samples
